content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find the apartment to your liking. Indeed, the location is very central, and I believe you'll appreciate the proximity to amenities. Let's discuss the price. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. It's quite spacious and in a great location, so I'm sure it's worth a reasonable amount. Could you tell me what you're asking for it?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand that you're looking for a fair price. The apartment is indeed spacious and in a prime location, which I feel justifies a higher rental rate. I'm looking to rent it out for €950 per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €950 is quite a high price for an unfurnished apartment. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower rate? The apartment is not furnished, and I would need to invest in furniture as well.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I appreciate your perspective. However, the location and the quality of the apartment do justify the price. Nevertheless, I'm willing to consider a slight reduction for a long-term tenant. How about €900 per month? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €900 is still quite steep. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. Could we perhaps meet in the middle? How about €850? This would be a fair price for both parties, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, as a landlord, I need to ensure that I'm getting a fair price for my property. €850 is below my expectations, but given your situation, I'm willing to make an exception. I agree to the price of €850 Euro! Let's proceed with the paperwork.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of €850 Euro! Thank you, Mister Schmidt, for your generosity. This is a great deal for me, and I'm looking forward to a long and prosperous tenancy. Shall we discuss the terms and conditions now?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. Let's discuss the terms and conditions. I'm glad to have reached an agreement that suits both of us. How long are you planning to rent the apartment for? Would you like a one-year lease, or are you looking for a more flexible arrangement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I would like to start with a one-year lease to begin with. This will give me some stability as a student, and I'm sure I'll enjoy living here. Regarding the terms and conditions, are there any specific requirements you have for tenants?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: For the terms and conditions, I require that the apartment be kept in good condition and that all utilities are paid on time. Additionally, I expect quiet and respectful behavior from my tenants. As for the lease, a one-year term is acceptable. Would you like to sign the lease agreement today?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, I'm more than willing to sign the lease agreement today. I appreciate your trust in me as a tenant, and I assure you I will abide by all the terms and conditions. Shall we proceed to the paperwork?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent, Yi-Nuo. We can proceed with the paperwork. Once the lease is signed, we'll need to discuss the security deposit and the date from which the rent will be due. Would you prefer to pay the deposit and the first month's rent together?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm ready to pay the security deposit and the first month's rent together. This will secure the apartment for me, and I'm looking forward to moving in as soon as possible. Could you provide me with the necessary documents and information regarding the payment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo. I'll prepare the lease agreement and the details for the security deposit and first month's rent. Please let me know when would be a convenient time for you to come by and sign the documents. Once we have the lease in place, we can discuss the specifics of the payment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm available tomorrow afternoon. Could we meet at your office around 2 p.m. to sign the lease and discuss the payment arrangements? This will allow me to finalize my plans and move in as soon as possible.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Tomorrow afternoon at 2 p.m. is perfect. I'll see you then at my office. Please bring a copy of your ID and your student enrollment certificate, as well as the necessary funds for the security deposit and first month's rent. We'll go over everything in detail and finalize the agreement. See you tomorrow!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: See you tomorrow, Mister Schmidt. I'll bring all the required documents and the funds for the security deposit and first month's rent. I'm looking forward to signing the lease and becoming your tenant. Thank you for your time and for offering me this wonderful apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad we could reach an agreement that suits both of us. I look forward to having you as a tenant. See you tomorrow at 2 p.m. with all the necessary documents and payments. Until then, if you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll be in touch if I have any questions. See you tomorrow at 2 p.m. with everything prepared. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
